sentences.en: At bedtime, I take off my clothes and put on my pajamas.
sentences.cn: 睡觉时, 我脱去衣服,换上睡衣.

sentences.en: By bedtime I had reasoned myself out of the whole thing.
sentences.cn: 到就寝时,我已使自己从这整个事件中得出结论.

sentences.en: Don't get the children overexcited just before bedtime.
sentences.cn: 临睡前不要让孩子过于兴奋。

sentences.en: I'm partial to a drink at bedtime.
I've tried a hot drink at bedtime and counting sheep, but I just can't seem to get to sleep these days.
sentences.cn: 我已试过在睡觉前喝些热饮料和心里计数的方法, 但目前我似乎就是睡不着.

sentences.en: If you go to bed now, I've read you a bedtime story.
sentences.cn: 假使你现在就上床睡觉, 我就念个睡前故事给你听.

sentences.en: It is most effective at bedtime and in the morning.
sentences.cn: 在睡前和在晨起后用这种方法都是很有效的.
八点半了，特雷弗该上床睡觉了。

sentences.en: It's coming up on your bedtime.
Mother read the children a bedtime story to hasten them to the land of Nod.
sentences.cn: 妈妈给孩子们念催眠故事,使他们快快进入睡乡.

sentences.en: The boy was fast asleep before the bedtime story was finished.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩没等临睡前的故事讲完就睡熟了.

sentences.en: The children are having a frolic before bedtime.
sentences.cn: 孩子们睡觉前正在嬉戏玩闹.

sentences.en: The children begged her to read them a bedtime story.
sentences.cn: 孩子们恳求她给他们念一段上床时讲的故事.

sentences.en: Try gradually to quiet them down as bedtime approaches.
sentences.cn: 临近就寝的时候，要尽量让他们渐渐安静下来。

trans.tran_en: the time when you usually go to bed
